title: Hidden Trap
description: As you walk through the trees, your foot bumps into something metallic half-buried under the leaves. It's an old rusty bear trap.

outcomes.successText: With precise movements, you manage to deactivate the mechanism. Now you can take it to use as a trap.
outcomes.failureText: The rusty mechanism snaps and grabs your ankle. The pain is excruciating.

results.text: You are careful not to trip again and continue your journey.

title: Giant Spider Webs
description: You come across a patch of forest covered in thick, sticky webs. They seem deserted, but you can't be sure.

outcomes.successText: You move slowly, avoiding the thickest strands. You manage to get to the other side without problems.
outcomes.failureText: You get tangled. As you free yourself, a spider the size of a fist descends and bites you before fleeing.

results.text: You decide it's not worth the risk. You find an alternative path, but lose precious time.

title: Hermit's Shelter
description: You discover a small abandoned cabin, hidden among the trees. The door is open and it seems no one has been there for a long time.

outcomes.successText: Inside you find a small survival stash: canned food, clean water, and expired but still usable medicines.
outcomes.failureText: The cabin was looted long ago. Nothing useful remains, only dust and cobwebs.

results.text: You take a regenerating break under shelter. You feel more rested.

title: Ancient Tree
description: A massive and ancient tree dominates the clearing. At its base is an opening leading into the hollow trunk.

choices.text: Explore the inside of the trunk

outcomes.successText: Inside you find an old hunter's shelter with supplies and tools.
outcomes.failureText: The trunk is full of aggressive insects. You are forced to exit quickly.

choices.text: Rest in the shade of the tree

results.text: There is something peaceful about this place. You feel invigorated.

title: Wolf Den
description: Wolf tracks and gnawed bones indicate a den nearby. You hear distant howls.

outcomes.successText: You move silently and bypass the den without being noticed.
outcomes.failureText: A wolf spots you and attacks before you can move away.

choices.text: Search the den when the wolves are away

outcomes.successText: You find the den empty and recover some useful hides and bones.
outcomes.failureText: The wolves return while you are in the den. You have to fight to get out.

title: Mushroom Patch
description: A vast area covered in colorful mushrooms. Some look edible, others... definitely not.

outcomes.successText: You recognize the safe mushrooms and gather several. They are nutritious.
outcomes.failureText: You are mistaken. Some mushrooms are toxic. You eat them and get sick.

choices.text: Don't risk it. Leave the mushrooms

results.text: Without proper knowledge, mushrooms can be deadly. Better to avoid.

title: Hunter's Cache
description: You discover a shed camouflaged among the trees. It seems recently used.

outcomes.successText: The hunter left equipment and ammunition. You take them.
outcomes.failureText: The shed is empty. Maybe the hunter will return soon. Better to go.

results.text: It's not right to steal from another survivor. You walk away.

title: Hanged Man
description: A corpse dangles from a tree, hung by a rope. It doesn't look like a suicide.

outcomes.successText: It's a warning. You find signs of raiders nearby. You also find something in the dead man's pockets.
outcomes.failureText: You find no clues. Only the macabre sight of a violent death.

results.text: Whoever did this might still be around. Better not stay.

title: Grazing Deer
description: An adult deer grazes peacefully, unaware of your presence. Fresh meat...

outcomes.successText: You approach silently and strike. The deer falls. You have meat and hides.
outcomes.failureText: The deer hears you and runs away. You lost the opportunity.

results.text: There is already too much death in this world. You let the animal live.

title: Poison Ivy
description: You walk through an area densely covered with vegetation. Too late you realize it's poison ivy!

results.text: You use water to remove the poisonous oils. You avoid the worst.
Hours later, the skin starts to burn and swell. You have been poisoned.

title: Hidden Beehive
description: A large beehive is hidden among the branches of a tree. It drips golden honey.

outcomes.successText: The smoke calms the bees. You gather precious honey.
outcomes.failureText: The bees get angry and attack you en masse.

results.text: It's not worth risking potentially deadly stings.

title: Territorial Boar
description: A massive boar blocks the path, growling. It is clear it doesn't want company.

outcomes.successText: You make enough noise to scare the boar. It moves away growling.
outcomes.failureText: The boar charges! Its impact is devastating.

results.text: Better not risk a fight. You bypass the animal carefully.

title: Abandoned Campsite
description: Remains of a campsite with torn tents and an extinguished fire. Something went wrong here.

outcomes.successText: You find scattered supplies and still usable equipment.
outcomes.failureText: There is nothing of value. Only signs of violence.

results.text: Whoever attacked this camp might return.

title: Bear Tracks
description: Huge footprints in the damp ground. A bear, and a big one. Recent.

outcomes.successText: You find the bear's den. It is empty and contains remains of prey. You find something useful.
outcomes.failureText: The bear is in the den! It attacks you furiously.

results.text: A bear is not something to mess with. You choose another path.

title: Ritual Circle
description: Stones arranged in a circle with strange symbols carved on them. In the center, ash and burnt bones. The air here seems to vibrate with an almost imperceptible frequency.

outcomes.successText: Under one of the main stones, protected by a waxed leather wrapping, you find a journal. The pages are full of astronomical symbols, complex calculations, and notes written in a frantic handwriting. It speaks of 'dissonant frequencies', of 'harmonizing echoes', and of a 'shielding ritual'. It is not the diary of a madman, but of someone who was desperately looking for a solution.
outcomes.failureText: The symbols are too complex. They look astronomical, but you can't decipher them. You find only ash and bones.

success.text: [DISCOVERY] The journal mentions two other 'places of power' needed to complete the ritual.

choices.text: This place gives you the creeps. Leave

results.text: There is a dark energy here. You decide not to stay.

title: Clear Stream
description: A crystal clear stream flows between the rocks. The water looks clean.

outcomes.successText: The water is clean and fresh. You fill your reserves.
outcomes.failureText: You drink too fast and get a stomach ache.

results.text: The sound of water is relaxing. You take a break.

title: Snare Trap
description: Your foot trips on a wire. A snare tightens around your ankle and lifts you upside down!

choices.text: Cut the rope with your knife

outcomes.successText: You cut the rope and fall controlling the fall. You are free.
outcomes.failureText: You fall badly and get hurt.

choices.text: Try to free yourself by wriggling

results.text: After long minutes of painful effort, you manage to free your foot.

title: Owl's Nest
description: A large nest on a tall tree. Inside shine shiny objects that the owl has collected.

outcomes.successText: You reach the nest while the owl is away. You find coins and a small jewel.
outcomes.failureText: The owl returns and attacks your eyes. You fall from the tree.

results.text: It's not right to steal from an animal's nest. You leave it alone.

title: Medicinal Herbs
description: You recognize some plants with healing properties growing in this area.

outcomes.successText: You gather the herbs correctly. They are powerful natural medicines.
outcomes.failureText: You get confused and gather the wrong plants. Useless.

results.text: Without botanical knowledge, you could do more harm than good.

title: Woodcutter's Cabin
description: An old cabin with rusty axes and saws scattered everywhere. The door is open.

outcomes.successText: You find tools still in good condition and wood already cut.
outcomes.failureText: The cabin is full of cobwebs and mold. Nothing useful.

results.text: You take a break under shelter. You feel less tired.

title: Mushroom Ring
description: A perfect circle of white mushrooms. Legends said they were fairy portals. Now you know they are just mushrooms.

choices.text: Gather the mushrooms from the circle

outcomes.successText: They are edible and nutritious mushrooms. You gather many.
outcomes.failureText: They are poisonous! You taste one by mistake and get sick.

results.text: Old superstitions die slowly. You decide not to risk it.

title: Fallen Tree
description: A huge felled tree blocks the path. You will have to climb over it or go around it.

outcomes.successText: You climb over the tree without problems.
outcomes.failureText: You slip and fall on the other side, hurting yourself.

results.text: You go around the tree carefully. You lose some time but arrive safe and sound.

title: Raven Flock
description: Hundreds of black ravens gather on the trees, watching you with their bright eyes. It is unsettling.

results.text: The ravens croak and fly away. They are just birds.

outcomes.successText: The ravens guide you to a fresh carcass. You recover meat and hides.
outcomes.failureText: The ravens fly away without leading you anywhere. You lose time.

title: Abandoned Mine Entrance
description: The entrance to an old mine opens into the rock. Dark and threatening.

outcomes.successText: You find old mining tools and precious minerals in the upper tunnels.
outcomes.failureText: You get lost in the dark and take hours to get out. You wasted time and energy.

results.text: Mines are dangerous places. You decide not to enter.
